dcterms:creator: H. Yannakoudakis
T. Briscoe
B. Medlock
dcterms:description: The FCE dataset is used for automatically grading ESOL texts, providing a large collection of learner English sentences with annotations for grammatical errors.
dcterms:title: FCE (First Certificate in English)

dcterms:creator: T. Mizumoto
M. Komachi
M. Nagata
Y. Matsumoto
dcterms:description: The Lang-8 dataset consists of learner-generated content where users write in a foreign language and receive corrections from native speakers, useful for training error correction systems.
dcterms:title: Lang-8

dcterms:creator: D. Dahlmeier
H. T. Ng
S. M. Wu
dcterms:description: NUCLE is a large annotated corpus of learner English, providing a resource for studying grammatical errors made by learners.
dcterms:title: NUCLE (National University of Singapore Corpus of Learner English)

dcterms:creator: H. Yannakoudakis
Ã˜. E. Andersen
A. Geranpayeh
T. Briscoe
D. Nicholls
dcterms:description: The W&I+LOCNESS dataset combines the Write & Improve corpus with the LOCNESS corpus, providing a resource for evaluating grammatical error correction systems.
dcterms:title: W&I+LOCNESS (Write & Improve + LOCNESS corpus)
